ing: 3 tablespoons Amaretto (almond liqueur) or maple syrup
n: Mashed Sweet Potatoes by Jean Carper
des: "It's a snap to prepare the classic mashed sweet potato side dish when you enlist the microwave for assistance!"
ins: Microwave whole potatoes until done. Cool to touch. Remove pulp. Mash with liqueur and spices. Top with almonds. Reheat in microwave.
